DOC.brief_summary: Primary Aim : To test acute effect olanzapine ziprasidone administration , comparison placebo , insulin sensitivity antipsychotic-naïve healthy young men , measure whole-body dextrose infusion rate ( mg/kg/min ) , hepatic glucose production ( glucose rate appearance [ Ra ] ) , primarily muscle glucose utilization ( glucose rate disappearance [ Rd ] ) , adipose tissue relate free fatty acid production ( glycerol rate appearance [ Ra ] ) . We hypothesize olanzapine , ziprasidone , result acute decrease insulin sensitivity . Secondary Aim : To test acute effect olanzapine ziprasidone insulin signal pathway antipsychotic naïve healthy young men . We hypothesize olanzapine , ziprasidone , result acute alteration insulin signal .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Volunteers Study Effects Olanzapine Ziprasidone
DOC.criteria: Males age 1845 year BMI approximately ≥ 25 < 35 insulin approximately ≥ 15 µU/ml triglyceride approximately ≥ 130 mg/dl Any DSMIV Axis I diagnosis prisoner serious medical disorder ( i.e . metabolic disease , type 1 2 diabetes mellitus , endocrine disease , coagulopathy , clinically significant anemia , acute infection ) take prescription medication nonsedentary lifestyle > 3 hour exercise per week
